original_text: or used a stone that could cause death, and without seeing him dropped it on him, so that he died, though he was not his enemy and did not seek his harm,
korean_text: 보지 못하고 사람을 죽일 만한 돌을 던져서 죽였을 때에 이는 악의도 없고 해하려 한 것도 아닌즉

sentences.original_text: or used a stone that could cause death
sentences.korean_translation: 또는 죽음을 초래할 수 있는 돌을 사용하고

sentences.original_text: though he was not his enemy
and did not seek his harm
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그에게 해를 입히려 하지 않았으니
